full_summary:
================================

Tender Announcement - Telemedical Assistance Service for the Canadian Coast Guard
--------

### Title
 Telemedical Assistance Service for the Canadian Coast Guard

### Reference Number
 cb-9037-65477915

### Solicitation Number
 30004539

### Publication Date
 2023-09-13

### Tender Closing Date
 2023-10-09 14:00:00

### Amendment Information
 This tender announcement has undergone 4 amendments (Amendment Number cb-9037-65477915-4), with the most recent amendment dated 2023-10-09.

### Expected Contract Period
 The contract is expected to commence on 2023-11-01 and will initially run for a period of 12 months, with the option for 3 renewal periods.

### Brief Description
 The successful bidder will provide a Telemedical Assistance Service (TMAS) to vessels operating within the Canadian Coast Guard Search and Rescue Region (SRR) on a 24/7 basis. The TMAS will be staffed by qualified medical professionals who can conduct remote consultations and are familiar with the specific medical needs of such vessels.

### Key Objectives
The successful bidder will be expected to provide:

* A reliable and skilled Telemedical Assistance Service (TMAS) to vessels operating within the Canadian Coast Guard Search and Rescue Region (SRR)
* Services 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, and 365 days a year
* Initial contract period of 12 months, with the option for 3 renewal periods

### Attachment
 Refer to the following documents for more information:
  * Coast Guard Fleet Logistics Manual 400.00.07 Pharmaceuticals, Medical Supplies and Related Items
  * Request for Proposal (RFP) Final
  * Addendum 1 to the RFP

### Contact
 For more information, please contact Tina Brown at:
 301 Bishop Drive
 Fredericton, NB
 Canada E3C 2M6
 Phone: (506) 238-3224
